participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and resilient, he strives to create a path for himself despite his family's disapproval. He enjoys the finer things in life and has a keen eye for style.
participant_1.background: my family does not support my career choices. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Energetic and sociable, she finds joy in everyday activities and maintains a balanced lifestyle with her pets and fitness routine.
participant_2.background: eating is something i do when i'm bored. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. two dogs live with me.

content.text: hello, how are you? I just got back from shopping. I love it
